prod_desc: Help Batgirl™ nab Mad Harriet™ and recover the microchip!
prod_long_desc:
Join in the action-packed LEGO® DC Super Hero Girls™ world as Batgirl™ and her Bat-Bot encounter Mad Harriet™ and the green Kryptomite™ when they break into the Batgirl Secret Bunker! This great set features an opening bunker with 2 levels including a workout area, IT lab, gear-up area, zipline, Bat-Wagon with foldout wings and foldup wheels, and plenty of accessory elements.
Includes Batgirl™ and Mad Harriet™ mini-doll figures, plus the Batgirl Bat-Bot and a green Kryptomite™ figure.
Features a bunker that opens to reveal rooms inside, with a rotating periscope and opening gate, dangling punching bag and weight bench in the training area on the first level, gear-up area with accessories, IT lab with view screen and window, plus a zipline from the top level down to the Bat-Wagon.
Also includes Batgirl’s ‘flying’ Bat-Wagon with folding wings, tires that fold up for flight and a holding cell.
Work out in the training area with the punching bag and weight bench.
Rotate the periscope to keep an eye on the surrounding area.
Slide down the zipline for a shortcut to the Bat-Wagon, then extend the wings and fold up the tires to take off.
Accessory elements include a water bottle, weight, handcuffs, bat surveillance camera, Batarang, microchip, punching bag, training mat and a display hanger for foil wings.
Connect the zipline system with the 41238 Lena Luthor™ Kryptomite™ Factory to expand your Super Hero play!
Cute but evil Kryptomites are included in every LEGO® DC Super Hero Girls™ set.
Bunker measures over 5” high, 8” wide and 1” long.
Bat-Wagon measures over 2” high, 4” long and 2” wide.
